name: Shock Bios
description:
Arrow keys to move.

Space to fire.

1-5 to pick weapon. (Right Bolt (C:2), Left Bolt(C:2), Right Flame(C:1), Left Flame (C:1), Hover Bolt(C:4)t)

C on corpse to consume corpse.

Eliminate all Bio on each of the two levels to win.

Visit my blog at: johansenindustries.wordpress.com.
